meanings.definition: A person who runs short distances at high speeds.
meanings.sent1: The sprinter dashed across the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: The sprinter trained hard to improve their speed.
meanings.sent3: The sprinter challenged a cheetah to a race for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the race of life, be a sprinter, not a marathon runner.
meanings.sent5: The sprinter's speed was like lightning on the track.

meanings.definition: A type of athletic event in which participants run short distances at high speeds.
meanings.sent1: The school organized a sprinter for the students to showcase their speed.
meanings.sent2: The sprinter at the Olympics set a new world record.
meanings.sent3: During the sprinter, one participant lost their shoe but still finished the race.
meanings.sent4: The sprinter of the relay team passed the baton smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered loudly as the sprinter crossed the finish line.
